alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 2:52PM CDT until April 22 at 12:08AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following county, Norman. * WHEN...Until 400 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 238 PM CDT, emergency management reported overland flooding across portions of Norman County. Overland flooding continues to impact the area, including township road closures. Satellite indicates the majority of overland flooding over western Norman County.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
